name: Riverward Hinterlands
economy_niches: freshwater fisheries and salting for inland markets
staging/transshipment node for coastal maritime trade
culture_adjustments: weaker formal guild authority; stronger riverhouse/clan patronage
ancestor-focused river rites layered onto coastal seamanship lore
apprenticeship emphasizes bargecraft, flood-reading and tethering
oral tradition centers flood-legends, log-tally ballads
practical ritualism: local reagent substitution and pooled sacrifices
constraints: limited imported reagents restrict high-cost rituals
notes: critical supplier of timber and reagents to coastal shipyards
political influence dominated by riverhouse patrons, not guilds
seasonal navigation windows constrain long-distance shipments
